features: SPECIALIZED FOR CHILDREN'S DESIGN: After two generations of product updates, YJ-803 electronic handheld game console has become more designed, and the size and appearance are more suitable for children's hand shape. Let your child hold the game machine in a more comfortable position.

VIBRATING AND CLASSIC GAMES: The handheld video games is built-in with 198 non-repeating classic games, including 6 game types: puzzle, action, educational, sports, leisure and tabletop. Among them, there are 48 games with vibrating sensation, which can make your kids more immersive.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE: There are two small holes on the top of the retro handheld game console, you can buy a lanyard by yourself so that you can hang the console around your neck and take it out to play anytime, anywhere. (Lanyard is not included in the package)

ENOUGH POWER: The handheld games uses 1800mAh large capacity battery, enough to support you to use it for 4-6 hours in the field, on the go or on transportation. Equipped with type-c cable, support charging and playing at the same time.

GIFT PACKAGING: Beautifully packaged in a gift case, no need for secondary packaging, perfect gift for children aged 3-8 years old. And we offer a hassle-free warranty, if your portable game console has non-human caused damage and quality problems, we will provide replacement or refund service until you are satisfied.
Warm Tips: This game machine is only suitable for children aged 3-8 years old to use for leisure and entertainment, not suitable for professional game machine players.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Newest Taddtoy Handheld Game Console The Taddtoy YJ-803 handheld game console is designed for kids ages 3-8. The console is designed to be compact and lightweight, making it ideal for carrying around. If you are looking for a suitable gift for your child, this product will be a good choice. Warm Tips: This game machine is only suitable for children aged 3-8 years old to use for leisure and entertainment, not suitable for professional game machine players.

Product Features Assist Buttons We add two assistant buttons on the top of the game console, which can replace the traditional A/B buttons. Adding more fun to the game. 48 Vibration Games There are 48 built-in vibrating games, where certain actions during gameplay will make the console vibrate. 3.2-Inch Screen With a more advanced screen, more durable and drop-proof. No longer prone to black screen or white screen.

The YJ-803 game console is equipped with an AV cable, you can connect the TV to get a better experience and share the joy and vision to your family. Package Contains: 1 x Game console 1 x User Manual 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x Type-C Cable 1 x AV Cable Warm Tips： 1. Before using the product, please read the instructions carefully. 2. The screen is covered with a protective film, you can choose to keep it or tear it off. 3. Without the function to save the progress of the game. 4. When using the game console for the first time, it is best to fully charge the battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great entertainment, vintage games!
reviews.reviewText: The grand kids love these and use them all the time, they even pick them over the Xbox quite often. These are great for car rides too. Tons of games to choose from. It has a volume button, comes with charger, cord and auxiliary cord. Our family loves these. It's lots of fun for adults too, especially those of us who grew up in the generation when these games originated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Good Little Time Waster
reviews.reviewText: Cheapo XX-in-ONE handhelds are a dime a dozen, you can find them for a few bucks anywhere. They have the usual collection of questionably legal ROMs but it seems that they've done some work with this one. There are 48 games that have been modified to work with a vibration function. Not a great feature but a new feature nonetheless.It's all from NES-era so there's a ton of arcade-style games which means a lot of immediate pick-up-and-play but also put-down-and-forget. I usually play a few rounds of Tetris (or #22 BONUS, as it's called in the menu) after a shower. If all you want is to burn a few minutes but don't want to get too engrossed with a more engaging game this handheld has a lot of potential.Weirdly enough there are games that still support 2-player mode, despite the fact that there is no way to connect a second controller.Unfortunately the D-pad is awkward to use and doesn't consistently register a press if your finger is on the right place. The rest of the hardware is fine. The other buttons work well and the screen is bright and easy to see. I love the fact that the power switch is a hardware switch that immediately turns the device on and off. There are also multiple turbo buttons which simulate the rapid pressing of A and B. Charging is done through USB-C, which is nice to see. However there is no indicator as to the device's current charge level, though in reality that isn't something you'd need to see.The AV mode does work, it automatically switches to the output when the cable is plugged in and the handheld becomes one of those TV plug-and-play consoles. You're going to want an older style 4:3 display for the authentic experience, bonus points for a CRT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps Child Busy and Quiet
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Although this is a modern electronic device, it is designed to look like an old-school game with around 200 different games to choose from. This is available in four different colors, so if there are multiple children in the home, each of them can have a distinct color.The game is simple to use and easy to hold in the hands of children. It includes a variety of games such as puzzles, action, instructional, and more. Some of them even feature vibrating abilities similar to those found in modern game systems.I like that this is a rechargeable device that may be used for four hours or more on a single charge. This is ideal for playing with in the car because it keeps the child busy and sitting still for extended periods. It includes a spot where you can connect a lanyard if you wish to wear it around the child's neck. This is inexpensive, entertaining, and fun for children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Replica game system
reviews.reviewText: Graphics are only ok not super clear. Portable and rechargeable though great for traveling. Small play screen as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Okay for what it is
reviews.reviewText: Item worked ok got it for my son. He may have been a little young for it, screen is very small much like the old Nokia phones. But for an inexpensive distraction it will do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This isn’t exactly for kids and poorly made.
reviews.reviewText: The games that come with this console are really cheap iterations of some classic games. Several of them are totaled glitched as if it was poorly coded. Some of the games are not what I would want my kid playing anyway. I was hoping it would be less violent and more learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun game, small screen
reviews.reviewText: This Handheld Portable Video Game System is an incredible gaming device that offers a diverse range of nearly 200 games, making it an excellent choice for younger kids who are looking for hours of entertainment. With its compact design and durability, this gaming system is a perfect companion for on-the-go fun.One of the highlights of this handheld portable game system is its extensive library of classic games that will undoubtedly bring back fond memories of my own childhood. Featuring nostalgic puzzle games and racing adventures, this device offers a fantastic mix of classic titles that both kids and adults will enjoy.The durability of the system is particularly noteworthy. Designed with younger kids in mind, it can withstand the occasional bumps and drops that are almost inevitable during playtime. Parents can have peace of mind knowing that this gaming system is built to last, ensuring long-lasting enjoyment for their children.The handheld portable system features a smaller screen, which is perfect for kids. While it may not provide the same level of detail as larger screens, it still delivers a vibrant gaming experience that is easily viewable. The size also makes it easier for younger hands to hold and operate comfortably.Additionally, the system's portability is a significant advantage. It is lightweight, allowing kids to easily take it anywhere they go. Whether it's during a long car journey or a waiting room, this device provides ample entertainment to keep young ones engaged and occupied.Overall, the Handheld Portable Video Game System is a superb choice for parents looking for a gaming device that combines durability, a wide selection of classic games, and kid-friendly features. Its ability to offer hours of entertainment and nostalgia is truly commendable. With this gaming system in hand, kids are sure to have a blast wherever they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is loving this game, love that is rechargeable!Great toy for great price!
